content:
I've written up the plunkr Aaron and I demo'd in more detail here http://plnkr.co/bpXxat
This walks through the various sub-parts of the ECL to explain how and why the template works.
Happy to answer any questions, and feel free to re-use any parts of the example in your own work.
It seems the above link is broken if you've opted in to the new Plunker UI - a more stable link seems to be http://run.plnkr.co/plunks/bpXxat/
